pull.title: miniscript: acount for all `StringType` variants in `Miniscriptdescriptor::ToString()`
pull.body:
In `MiniscriptDescriptor::ToStringHelper()` only `StringType::Private` variant of `type` argument was accounted.
This PR implement serializing w/ all variants of `StringType` & add a functionnal test for the descriptor triggereing the related issue.

Closes #31694
